<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
var vehicle;
var vehicleInfo;
var ready;
var stage;

var year;
var make;
var model;
var option;
var step;

var ddlYear;
var ddlMake;
var ddlModel;
var ddlOption;
var ddlSize;
var aCatalog;

function sendRequest(onReadyMethod, url, params, HttpMethod) {
	if (!HttpMethod) { HttpMethod = "GET"; }
	req = null;

	if (window.XMLHttpRequest) { req = new XMLHttpRequest; } //mozilla/safari 
	else if (window.ActiveXObject) { req = new ActiveXObject("Microsoft.XMLHTTP"); } //internet explorer 

	if (req) {
	    req.onreadystatechange = onReadyMethod;
		req.open(HttpMethod, url, true);
		req.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded");
		req.send(params);
	}
}

function pageLoadReadyState() {
    onReadyState();
    if (ready == 4) {
        if (stage == "1") {
        ddlMake.selectedIndex = $("#ddlmake3438 > option[value='" + vehicleInfo[1] + "']").index();
        makeClicked(pageLoadReadyState);
        } else if (stage == "2") {
        ddlModel.selectedIndex = $("#ddlmodel3438 > option[value='" + vehicleInfo[2] + "']").index();
        modelClicked(pageLoadReadyState);
        } else if (stage == "3") {
        ddlOption.selectedIndex = $("#ddloption3438 > option[value='" + vehicleInfo[3] + "']").index();
        optionClicked(pageLoadReadyState);
        }
    }
}

function onReadyState() {
    ready = req.readyState;
    var data = null;
    if (ready == 4) { //check ready state 
        data = req.responseText; //read response data 
        var items = data.split('|');
        var length = items.length;
        stage = items[0];
        if (stage == "1") {
            for (var i = 1; i < length - 1; i++) {
                createOption(ddlMake, items[i], items[i]);
            }
        } else if (stage == "2") {
            for (var i = 1; i < length - 1; i++) {
                createOption(ddlModel, items[i], items[i]);
            }
        } else if (stage == "3") {
            for (var i = 1; i < length - 1; i++) {
                createOption(ddlOption, items[i], items[i]);
            }
        } else if (stage == "4") {
            ddlSize.removeChild(ddlSize.firstChild);
            for (var i = 1; i < length - 1; i++) {
                createOption(ddlSize, items[i], items[i]);
            }
        }
    }
}

function createOption(parent, value, text) {
    var newOption = document.createElement('option');
    parent.appendChild(newOption);
    newOption.value = value;
    newOption.innerHTML = text;
}

function setUpVars() {
    ddlYear = document.getElementById("ddlyear3438");
    ddlMake = document.getElementById("ddlmake3438");
    ddlModel = document.getElementById("ddlmodel3438");
    ddlOption = document.getElementById("ddloption3438");
    ddlSize = document.getElementById("ddlsize3438");
    aCatalog = document.getElementById("cataloglink3438")
}

function yearClicked(readyStateMethod) {
    if (!readyStateMethod) { readyStateMethod = onReadyState }
   	step = "year";
	var selected = ddlYear.selectedIndex;
	year = ddlYear.options[selected].value;
	resetMakes();
	resetModels();
	resetOptions();
	resetSizes();
	if (selected != 0) {  //if they choose something other than the first select
		sendRequest(readyStateMethod, '/DesktopModules/VehicleLookupBar/fetch.aspx?step=one&year=' + year);
		ddlYear.disabled = 0;
		ddlMake.disabled = 0;
		ddlModel.disabled = 1;
		ddlOption.disabled = 1;
		ddlSize.disabled = 1;
		if (ie == 1) {
		    ddlYear.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlMake.style.width = '300px';
		    ddlModel.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlOption.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlSize.style.width = '25px';
		}
	}
}

function makeClicked(readyStateMethod) {
    if (!readyStateMethod) { readyStateMethod = onReadyState }
	step = "make";
	var selected = ddlMake.selectedIndex;
	make = ddlMake.options[selected].value;
	resetModels();
	resetOptions();
	resetSizes();
	if (selected != 0) {  //if they choose something other than the first select
	    sendRequest(readyStateMethod, '/DesktopModules/VehicleLookupBar/fetch.aspx?step=two&year=' + year + '&make=' + make);
	    ddlYear.disabled = 0;
	    ddlMake.disabled = 0;
	    ddlModel.disabled = 0;
	    ddlOption.disabled = 1;
	    ddlSize.disabled = 1;
		if (ie == 1) {
		    ddlYear.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlMake.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlModel.style.width = '300px';
		    ddlOption.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlSize.style.width = '25px';
		}
	}
}

function modelClicked(readyStateMethod) {
    if (!readyStateMethod) { readyStateMethod = onReadyState }
	step = "model";
	var selected = ddlModel.selectedIndex;
	model = escape(ddlModel.options[selected].value);
	resetOptions();
	resetSizes();
	if (selected != 0) {  //if they choose something other than the first select
	    sendRequest(readyStateMethod, '/DesktopModules/VehicleLookupBar/fetch.aspx?step=three&year=' + year + '&make=' + make + '&model=' + model);
	    ddlYear.disabled = 0;
	    ddlMake.disabled = 0;
	    ddlModel.disabled = 0;
	    ddlOption.disabled = 0;
	    ddlSize.disabled = 1;
		if (ie == 1) {
		    ddlYear.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlMake.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlModel.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlOption.style.width = '300px';
		    ddlSize.style.width = '25px';
		}
	}
}

function optionClicked(readyStateMethod) {
    if (!readyStateMethod) { readyStateMethod = onReadyState }
	step = "option";
	var selected = ddlOption.selectedIndex;
	option = escape(ddlOption.options[selected].value);
	resetSizes();
	if (selected != 0) {  //if they choose something other than the first select
	    sendRequest(readyStateMethod, '/DesktopModules/VehicleLookupBar/fetch.aspx?step=four&year=' + year + '&make=' + make + '&model=' + model + '&option=' + option);
	    ddlYear.disabled = 0;
	    ddlMake.disabled = 0;
	    ddlModel.disabled = 0;
	    ddlOption.disabled = 0;
	    ddlSize.disabled = 0;
		if (ie == 1) {
		    ddlYear.style.width = '80px';
		    ddlMake.style.width = '80px';
		    ddlModel.style.width = '80px';
		    ddlOption.style.width = '80px';
		    ddlSize.style.width = '80px';
		}
	}
}

function setCookie(c_name, value, exdays){
    var exdate = new Date();
    exdate.setDate(exdate.getDate() + exdays);
    var c_value = value + ((exdays == null) ? '' : '; expires=' + exdate.toUTCString());
    document.cookie = c_name + '=' + c_value;
}

function getCookie(c_name) {
    var c_value = document.cookie;
    var c_start = c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
    if (c_start == -1) {
        c_start = c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");
    }
    if (c_start == -1) {
        c_value = null;
    }
    else {
        c_start = c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1;
        var c_end = c_value.indexOf(";", c_start);
        if (c_end == -1) {
            c_end = c_value.length;
        }
        c_value = unescape(c_value.substring(c_start, c_end));
    }
    return c_value;
}

function goToCatalog() {
    if (ddlOption.selectedIndex != 0) {
        var vehicleInfo = $('#ddlyear3438 option:selected').text() + ' ' +
                          $('#ddlmake3438 option:selected').text() + ' - ' +
                          $('#ddlmodel3438 option:selected').text() + ' (' +
                          $('#ddloption3438 option:selected').text() + ')';
        setCookie('vehicle', vehicleInfo, 1);
	    var selected = ddlSize.selectedIndex;
	    var size = ddlSize.options[selected].value;
	    var s = size.split(' ');
	    var width = s[0];
	    var aspect = s[1];
	    var rim = s[2];
	    var url = 'http://www.alsautomotiveandtruck.com/shop-for-tires.aspx' + '?view=SR&width=' + width + '&aspect=' + aspect + '&rim=' + rim + '&brand=-1';
	    window.location = url;
	} else {
	    alert('Please select a vehicle (Year, Make, Model, Option, & Size.)');
    }
}

function resetMakes() {
    while (ddlMake.hasChildNodes()) { //removes items from dropdown if some already exist
        ddlMake.removeChild(ddlMake.firstChild);
    }
    createOption(ddlMake, '-1', '- Make -');
    ddlMake.selectedIndex = 0;
}

function resetModels() {
    while (ddlModel.hasChildNodes()) { //removes items from dropdown if some already exist
        ddlModel.removeChild(ddlModel.firstChild);
    }
    createOption(ddlModel, '-1', '- Model -');
    ddlModel.selectedIndex = 0;
}

function resetOptions() {
    while (ddlOption.hasChildNodes()) { //removes items from dropdown if some already exist
        ddlOption.removeChild(ddlOption.firstChild);
    }
    createOption(ddlOption, '-1', '- Option -');
    ddlOption.selectedIndex = 0;
}

function resetSizes() {
    while (ddlSize.hasChildNodes()) { //removes items from dropdown if some already exist
        ddlSize.removeChild(ddlSize.firstChild);
    }
    createOption(ddlSize, '-1', '- Size -');
    ddlSize.selectedIndex = 0;
}

$(document).ready(function () {
    setUpVars();

    if (getCookie("vehicle") != null) {
        vehicle = getCookie("vehicle");
        vehicleInfo = new Array();

        vehicleInfo[0] = vehicle.substring(0, 4);
        vehicleInfo[1] = vehicle.substring(5, vehicle.indexOf('-') - 1);
        vehicleInfo[2] = vehicle.substring(vehicle.indexOf('-') + 2, vehicle.indexOf('(') - 1);
        vehicleInfo[3] = vehicle.substring(vehicle.indexOf('(') + 1, vehicle.length - 1);

        ddlYear.selectedIndex = $("#ddlyear3438 > option:contains(" + vehicleInfo[0] + ")").index();
        yearClicked(pageLoadReadyState);
    }
});//]]>

<h1 class="webfont">Welcome to Al’s Automotive &amp; Truck Service Center</h1>
<p>Ever since we opened our doors at Al’s Automotive &amp; Truck Service Center, we have faithfully serviced the <a href="http://www.alsautomotiveandtruck.com/repair-services.aspx">automotive repair</a> and <a href="http://www.alsautomotiveandtruck.com/tire-brands.aspx">tire</a> needs of those in the Exeter, NH area. We are located at 156 Epping Rd. in Exeter, NH, where we offer a full line of competitively priced commercial and industrial tires from the industry’s best tire brands, like MICHELIN®, BFGoodrich®, Hankook, and more. Our facility has an automotive shop, a truck and trailer shop, and a towing and road service shop. We are an AC Delco Mastertech Service Center with ASE-certified mechanics that use auto parts with nationwide warranties. Open Monday through Friday from 7:00 AM – 5:00 PM and Saturday by appointment only, we serve customers from Exeter, and the surrounding cities of Portsmouth and Epping. So come into Al’s Automotive &amp; Truck Service Center today for a quote on a repair service, or visit us online to schedule an appointment.</p>

<div class="c_DNN6 c_DNN6_Header">
	<div id="dnn_ctr3433_ContentPane"><!-- Start_Module_3433 --><div id="dnn_ctr3433_ModuleContent" class="DNNModuleContent ModDNNHTMLC">
	<div id="dnn_ctr3433_HtmlModule_lblContent" class="Normal">
		<p>Al’s Automotive &amp; Truck Service Center is a pillar of the Exeter, NH&#160;&amp;&#160;Eliot, ME communities. <a href="http://www.alsautomotiveandtruck.com/">Al’s Automotive &amp; Truck Service Center</a> is a leader in offering name brand tires, wheels, auto repair and brake services for customers located in and around the Exeter, New Hampshire area. Our goal is to focus on customer service. It is the foundation of our business. Al’s Automotive &amp; Truck Service Center employs a well-trained staff specializing in the sale and installation of passenger car, performance and light truck or SUV tires. Custom wheels are available at Al’s Automotive &amp; Truck Service Center. Special wheels and rims compliment any tire or customer vehicle. Complete under-car services, such as oil changes, brakes, shocks, struts, alignment, and transmission fluid flush for both foreign and domestic vehicles are readily available at competitive prices. Take this opportunity to browse Al’s Automotive &amp; Truck Service Center website or call us for personalized service.</p>
<p><a href="http://www.alsautomotiveandtruck.com/locations.aspx">Al’s Automotive &amp; Truck Service Center Locations</a>:</p>
<p><strong>Exeter, NH</strong> – Looking for tires in Exeter, NH then Al’s Automotive &amp; Truck Service Center has the right tires for your car. Our Exeter, New Hampshire location offers many <a href="http://www.alsautomotiveandtruck.com/tire-brands.aspx">Exeter, NH tires</a> that are affordable and other Exeter, NH tire services for your car. They offer auto repair Exeter, NH services to the Exeter, New Hampshire community including brakes, tune ups, and any other <a href="http://www.alsautomotiveandtruck.com/repair-services.aspx">Exeter, NH auto repair</a> services your car might need. Give our Exeter, NH location a call at <strong>(603) 778-8158</strong> today to schedule an appointment.</p>
<p><strong>Eliot,&#160;ME</strong> – Looking for tires in Exeter, NH then Al’s  Automotive &amp; Truck Service Center has the right tires for your car.  Our Eliot, Maine location offers many <a href="http://www.alsautomotiveandtruck.com/tire-brands.aspx">Eliot,ME tires</a>  that are affordable and other Eliot,&#160;ME tire services for your car.  They offer auto repair Eliot,&#160;ME services to the Eliot, Maine  community including brakes, tune ups, and any other <a href="http://www.alsautomotiveandtruck.com/repair-services.aspx">Eliot, ME auto repair</a> services your car might need. Give our Eliot,&#160;ME location a call at <strong>(207) 361-1166</strong> today to schedule an appointment.</p>
<p>Al’s Automotive &amp; Truck Service Center provides quality automotive products and services to customers in Exeter, NH, Portsmouth, NH, and Epping, NH.  Al’s Automotive &amp; Truck Service Center is the leading seller in Exeter, NH for these tire brands MICHELIN®, BFGoodrich® and Hankook and offers some great discounts on them. Al’s Automotive &amp; Truck Service Center also offers services in Tires, Auto Repairs and Towing and Road Service for the communities of Exeter, NH, Portsmouth, NH, and Epping, NH. Give Al’s Automotive &amp; Truck Service Center a call to schedule an appointment today!</p>
	</div>
